My Projects

Check out some of my projects...

Data Science (Python) Description: Used real life data to find statistics using pythons num pi. This was achieved by using the data from spreadsheets which is how the relevant statistics were found. Project Github
Discrete Event Simulation (Java) Description: Simulated Minneapolis bus route #3 to find the best PMPG(Passengers Miles Per Gallon) for the bus company. Found real life statistics including average waiting time, average occupancy on each bus, etc. Project Github
Website Portfolio (HTML,JavaScrpit,CSS) Description: Developed my own portfolio website in both HTML5, JavaScript, CSS that showcases my skills as a programmer and my ability to learn on my own. Also, shows my talents in website design. Project Github
